sections.title: Introduction
content: Welcome to the Airwallex API documentation.
Here you will learn how to integrate and interact with Airwallex services efficiently.
The documentation is organized by sections that cover endpoints, authentication, data types, errors, and more.

sections.title: Getting Started
content: Follow these steps to quickly get up and running with the Airwallex API.
2. Obtain your Client ID and API key.
3. Test endpoints in a secure environment before going live.

sections.title: Authentication
content: Learn how to authenticate requests using Client ID and API key.
Obtain access tokens to call secure endpoints.
Handle token expiration and refresh tokens as needed.

sections.title: Billing
content: This section covers billing, invoices, and payment management.
Retrieve invoices, check payment status, and manage billing details.
Use the API to automate billing workflows efficiently.
